Package com.googlecode.objectify.impl.translate.opt.joda

Class Summary
BigMoneyStringTranslatorFactory Stores BigMoney as its string representation.
DateTimeZoneTranslatorFactory Stores a joda DateTimeZone as its String id.
JodaMoneyTranslators A convenient static method that adds all the joda-money related converters to your factory's conversions.
JodaTimeTranslators A convenient static method that adds all the joda-time related converters to your factory's conversions.
LocalDateTranslatorFactory Stores LocalDate as a String in ISO format: yyyy-MM-dd
MoneyStringTranslatorFactory Stores Money as its string representation.
ReadableInstantTranslatorFactory Converts Joda ReadableInstants (DateTime, DateMidnight, etc) into java.util.Date
